item.description:
People meditate for a lot of different reasons. Stress relief? It’ll give you that. Want to handle anger better? It’ll give you that too. Want to figure out what life’s all about? That’s the greatest gift meditation brings.

This is a telephone seminar with Allan Hughes, DC. Teleseminars are great. You don't have to get in the car or even leave the house--just pick up the phone. How easy is that? To register, go to newenginfo@sos.org and put teleseminar in the subject line. You'll be contacted with a phone number and access number you can use to get on the call.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Why Do We Meditate (Teleseminar)
